START: ^Will: “Hey Mayor I’m planning for a large party to celebrate the town’s prosperity! I was wondering if you had any suggestions?”
CHOICES: ^Ask Lorraine to do a puppet show.
Oscar: ^Oscar grumbles a lot more than usual, but somehow, when you mention Lorraine will be there, he begrudgingly accepts.
Oscar_higher_thirty: ^When comes the time of the representation, Oscar gives an astounding dance performance. Everyone loves it, and you think you can see half a smile on Lorraine’s face. Could have been a shadow though.
Oscar_lower_thirty: ^When comes the time of the representation, Oscar seems exceedingly uncomfortable. He does one move, two moves, then leaves. Everyone is disappointed, Will and Lorraine most of all.
Adelaine_higher_thirty: ^Adelaine agrees to sing at the party and though her voice isn’t amazing, the fervor with which she sings enraptures will, and the rest of the villager. Everyone has a great time.
Adelaine_lower_thirty: ^Adelaine agrees to sing at the party and… well her voice isn’t amazing. Most people don’t care. Will still likes it though.
Lorraine: ^Lorraine has a collection of puppets that she uses to create a harrowing adventure of 3 heroes on a quest that makes everyone invested!
